root.name: 3D Active Meshes
root.description: 3D Active Mesh plug-in for cell segmentation and tracking in 3D images and sequences.
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:
- Version 1.2.0.1 Date 2012-11-28 14:51:20
Regression from version 1.0.1.0
- Version 1.2.0.0 Date 2012-10-23 16:36:01
NOTE: the interface is under re-development. A new, user-friendly plug-in will be out soon !
* New parameters to find new objects entering the scene * New option to stabilize the input data * Several bug fixes and performance improvements
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2012-09-26 17:47:42
Added "loaclize means" parameter
- Version 1.0.2.0 Date 2012-09-18 14:23:57
Fixed an issue when rasterizing empty meshes
- Version 1.0.1.0 Date 2012-09-03 17:06:28
* Fixed bug caused when saving an empty spreadsheet * Improve error diagnostics when rasterizing meshes
- Version 1.0.0.1 Date 2012-08-02 15:59:29
Throw appropriate errors when methods are used with incorrect parameters.
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2012-07-13 16:57:56
Show an error if no XLS file was chosen for output
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2012-07-10 18:59:22
